summary: A married, middle-aged woman is shocked to discover that her husband, who she thought was content in their marriage, has become infatuated with a beautiful younger woman and is planning to leave his family for her.
cast: Yvonne Mitchell|Anthony Quayle|Sylvia Syms|Andrew Ray|Carole Lesley|Michael Ripper|Nora Gordon|Marianne Stone|Olga Lindo|Harry Locke|Max Butterfield|Roberta Woolley|Melvyn Hayes|Cordelia Monsey
title: Woman in a Dressing Gown
